summary: Adds Skeletor to Skyrim as a powerful follower this is still a WIP will be adding lots of cool features figured I would throw what i have finished to the community!
descriptionHtml:
[b][color=#ff0000][size=4]THIS MOD IS BEING REWORKED AND REVISED ON STEAM WORKSHOP BY STEELBALLZ! That is my steam username, UPDATE WILL EVENTUALLY BE UPLOADED ON NEXUS IN TIME, IF ANYONE WANTS TO LEND A HAND ON THIS PROJECT HIT ME UP ON STEAM.[/size][/color][/b]

**Goals**
Panthor (the purple cat)
Voice Over
Skeletors Lair (player house)
Better Textures
Custom Meshes
He-Man
Battle Cat
Quest to obtain He-Man or Skeletor
author: Rodrick1981
